data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the state of Tocantins.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tocantins, Brazil
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Tocantins to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in Tocantins to agree with you and with one another.
Jesus, please give the apostles in Tocantins, Brazil a vision for the harvest, and a passion to see the gospel spread to every corner of the the state.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, bring the blind by a way that they don’t know. Lead the Xambioa people in paths that they don’t know. Make darkness light before them and crooked places straight. Do not forsake the Xambioa people.
Lord, teach your Word to the people of the the state of Tocantins, so that they can follow your ways all their life.
data.verse: Teach me, Lord, the way of your decrees, that I may follow it to the end.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,383,500 people living in the state of Tocantins.
Father, set on fire the hearts and passion of your church in the state of Tocantins.
data.verse: Do not be slothful in zeal, be fervent in spirit, serve the Lord.
